__e: Many lives were lost that day... including George's wife, Helen.
Including the one that says you and Max can't get along.
And please... please forgive me for all the lives I've taken... including the one I will take today.
I'm proper sick of everyone, including your girlfriend, putting me down!
Because you're a control freak, you have no respect for me, and you somehow think that everyone, including your own family, works for you.
You have everything, and everything you have, including your sanity, is because of me, because I stayed because I held you up, because I am this person.
I spent more time with that man than anyone. Including his family.
And that's why she left everything to me, including the house.
I keep thinking about all the people he's killed, I mean, including his own daughter.

Since that time, Long John Silver and his associates have murdered one of my men... murdered four of your men... murdered a family of three on the Underhill estate in cold blood last night, including an eight-year-old girl.
Seeing your brother was here the $ 75 includes personal instructions in 32 positions of lovemaking!
When I said I'd do anything to help, I didn't think that included a round of golf.
My plan was always to leave everything behind, you included.
That no one, including yourself, has any doubts that this is the right course of action.
And everything that happens is part of it, including you.
